results.title: Hazard
results.creator_credit: Tom Stobart, Geoffrey Sumner and Interfilm Productions
results.brief_description: An accident prevention film intended primarily for showing to new workers entering the steel industry. Aims at a person’s attitude to safety rather than suggesting specific safety rules, through the story of two steelworkers on a mountaineering holiday. Compares their attitude to risks in the mountains with a professional attitude to risks on the job.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Tom Stobart, Geoffrey Sumner and Interfilm Productions

results.title: Hayley's home movie
results.creator_credit: Gail Singer, John Spotton, Michael Scott and ONF | NFB
results.brief_description: Part of the Finding Our Way series, which deals with contemporary family-life issues, this is the story of twelve-year-old Hayley, who must acknowledge the finality of parental separation when her father’s new girlfriend abruptly enters her life. All the issues surrounding separation are realistically evoked. Hayley’s anger, and her fantasy about her parents reuniting, are the central focus. But Hayley’s personality is irrepressible; she finds strength in her own imagination and creativity, thus effecting the beginnings of a resolution.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Gail Singer, John Spotton, Michael Scott and ONF | NFB

results.title: Hawks & doves
results.creator_credit: Brian Rapsey and Victorian College of the Arts
results.brief_description: A sailor abandons his military duties and tries to hide himself from the national coverage of his desertion, and the war escalating in the Gulf. He finds comfort with his Uncle who served in Vietnam, but clashes with his father who did not go to war. Cast includes Andrew Mayne, Dorothy Blayney and Phillip Motherwell.

results.title: Hawaiian hospitality
results.creator_credit: Matson Hotels and Pan American World Airways
results.brief_description: Describes the facilities provided by the Matson hotels in Hawaii for the comfort and pleasure of holiday makers. All the thrills of surf-riding and surf skiing are portrayed. Glimpses of the informal buffet dinners provided by the Royal Hawaiian Hotel; islanders performing native dances before the guests and a mannequin parade on the terrace. Follows the tourists as they visit neighbouring islands.

results.title: Hawaii: the 50th state
results.brief_description: Describes the birth of the Hawaiian Islands and the creation of their spectacular land forms. Shows views of the still-active volcanoes on the island of Hawaii and the silent craters of Maui. Includes scenes of the city of Honolulu and of sugar and pineapple plantations.

results.title: Having twins
results.brief_description: Focuses on the experiences of several couples who have experienced the joys and problems associated with having twins. Includes comments by an obstetrician who explains the reasons why complications often attend the birth of twins, as well as footage showing an actual multiple birth.

results.title: Having a say: Helene
results.creator_credit: Chris O'Rourke and Healthsharing Women. Publishing and Production Group
results.brief_description: Helen came to Australia from France and found difficulty in fitting in. Language was a basic factor in her problem, but through English in the Workplace, her life changed as did her work satisfaction level.

results.title: Having a say
results.creator_credit: Chris O'Rourke and Healthsharing Women. Publishing and Production Group
results.brief_description: The English in the Workplace Scheme is designed to help non-English speaking unionists to take their place in Australian society. This program outlines the problems and the responses to the scheme.

results.title: Haven of peace
results.creator_credit: African Film Productions and Department of Social Development (Dar-es-Salaam)
results.brief_description: Considers the place of Dar-es-Salam in the development of a large multi-racial community. The port is represented as a colorful mixture of the old and the new, its traditional life and culture existing side by side with modern health, education and social services, housing schemes, and improvements in trade and communications.
